item.title: Accessibility & Inclusive Design Specialization
item.description:
• Studied WCAG 2.1 guidelines, assistive technologies, and practical techniques for inclusive design.
  • Practiced auditing flows for contrast, keyboard access, and screen reader support, then translating findings into concrete design and dev tasks.
  • Applied learnings to ongoing projects by updating components, patterns, and team checklists.
